pages.text: A vile mixture of a burning, sulfuric broth, certain plants with unique properties, as well as several hearty chunks ofâ€¦ its best not to ask. Drinking this foul brew in the presence of powerful demons proves your loyalty to them, and they shall deem you as worthy in order to share some of their power with.
When in a coven, only one member of the coven must ingest this concoction in order to allow their whole coven to access the powers of the demon.
